detail_desc: Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets and slim legs with creases and slits at the hems.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with a lace-covered V-neck and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, a seam at the waist with ties, and straight, ankle-length legs.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in patterned, stretch jersey.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short sleeves, and slits at the front.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, frill trim around the neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
Dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar and buttons at the front. Flap chest pockets, a yoke at the back, drawstring at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar and buttons at the front. Flap chest pockets, a yoke at the back, drawstring at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Thin coat in viscose twill with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. No fasteners. Unlined.
Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details and metal fasteners.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Fully lined windbreaker in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets with press-studs and sturdy, elasticated trims at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, frill details at the front and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey underdress.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, frill details at the front and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey underdress.
Short-sleeved dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs.
Bralette in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Low-rise cargo trousers in stretch twill with side pockets, flap leg pockets with a press-stud, decorative flap back pockets and skinny, ankle-length legs.

Calf-length dress in soft, patterned, jacquard-weave viscose with a round neckline and opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves, smocking at the waist and a seam and a flounce at the hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem, designed to look like the bottom of a shirt.

Set with a long-sleeved dress, a pair of leggings and a hairband. Dress in velour with a press-stud on one shoulder, a gathered seam at the top, heart-shaped front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Leggings and hairband in patterned jersey. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Hairband with a knot detail.
